pWheelContactData Class Reference
[Vehicle]

Contact information used by pWheel. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • VxVector contactPoint
    The point of contact between the wheel shape and the ground.
  • VxVector contactNormal
    The normal at the point of contact.
  • VxVector longitudalDirection
    The direction the wheel is pointing in.
  • VxVector lateralDirection
    The sideways direction for the wheel(at right angles to the longitudinal direction).
  • float contactForce
    The magnitude of the force being applied for the contact.
  • float longitudalSlip
    What these exactly are depend on NX_WF_INPUT_LAT_SLIPVELOCITY and NX_WF_INPUT_LNG_SLIPVELOCITY flags for the wheel.
  • float longitudalImpulse
    the clipped impulses applied at the wheel.
  • int otherShapeMaterialIndex
    The material index of the shape in contact with the wheel.
  • float contactPosition
    The distance on the spring travel distance where the wheel would end up if it was resting on the contact point.
  • CK3dEntity * contactEntity
    The distance on the spring travel distance where the wheel would end up if it was resting on the contact point.
  • pMaterial otherMaterial
    The material of the colliding shape.

Detailed Description

Contact information used by pWheel.

See also:
pWheel pWheel.getContact()

the clipped impulses applied at the wheel.
